summary:
**Monster: A Netflix Series**

"Monster" is a TV show on Netflix that tells true stories about famous criminals. Each season is about a different killer. The first season is about Jeffrey Dahmer, a serial killer. It became very popular on Netflix. The second season is about the Menendez brothers, who murdered their parents. The third season will be about Ed Gein. Though critics had mixed feelings, many people watched the show. It even won some awards.
title: Monster (American TV series)
